translations.translation: There will be the salutation by those of the right hand: "Peace on you.
he will be welcomed by the words: “Peace to you” from the People on the Right.
it will be with the people of the right hand, living in peace and security.
Then upon you is the greetings of peace (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), from those on the right.
Then Salam (peace) to you from those on the right.
Then peace to you from those on the right hand.
Peace be upon thee, Companion of the Right!'
Then (the greeting) "Peace be unto thee" from those on the right hand.
he will be greeted with, "Peace be to you," by those on the Right.
Then: peace Unto thee, for thou art of those on the right hand.
then [he will be told,] ‘Peace be on you, from the People of the Right Hand!’
(For him is the salutation), "Peace be unto thee", from the Companions of the Right Hand.
Then there is safety and peace (from the Punishment of Allah) for (you as you are from) those on the Right Hand.
(he will be greeted with): 'Peace be upon you, Companion of the Right'
Then, “Peace upon you,” from those on the Right.
Then [the angels will say], "Peace for you; [you are] from the companions of the right."

[56:91] then ‘Peace be to you’, that is, [then] for him there will be [peace by way of] security (salām) from   chastisement, [a greeting] from those of the right [hand], [arising] from the fact that he is one of them.

(Then (the greeting) "Peace be unto thee" from those on the right hand) then peace and safety to you from the people of the right hand; Allah has taken charge of their matter and saved them; it is also said this means: the people of Paradise greet you with the greeting of peace.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { فَسَلاَمٌ لَّكَ } يا ذا اليمن والكرامة { مِنْ } قبل { أَصْحَابِ ٱلْيَمِينِ } [الواقعة: 91] أمثالك، ترحيباً لك وتكريماً
